reference.title: Adding space to the data area of a thin pool

section.p: Use the procedures in this section to increase the amount of space in the data area of a thin pool. For more information about required minimums, see . Perform the procedures in this section in order.
section.note: Before proceeding, use the backup feature to perform a complete backup. Creating a backup is required. One of the procedures in this section manipulates the volume group partition, which could cause a loss of data if performed incorrectly. You must have a valid backup before proceeding.
